### Assessment of Safety Hazard and Environmental Aspects: HX210015
#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: MX-43014265688
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: HX210015
* **Publication Date**: 2024-01-24
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-05 14:00:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity**: Defence Construction Canada / Construction de Défense Canada

#### Tender Description

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites consulting firms to submit an abbreviated proposal to award a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA). The selected consultant will provide professional services to assess and identify safety hazards, environmental aspects, and determine risk for the Royal Canadian Navy's activities, operations, products, or services.

The consultant will be required to provide qualified safety and environmental personnel to support Conduct Hazard and Aspect Identification and Risk Assessment (HAIRA) services. The winning consultant must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Term**: One (1) year
* **Maximum Estimated Value**: $600,000.00 (including potential extensions)
* **Extension Term**: Up to four (4) additional one (1) year periods
* **Call-up Value**: Between $30,000.00 and $100,000.00

#### Notice Publication

The tender notice is available on the MERX Electronic Bidding System at [https://www.merx.com](https://www.merx.com).  Bidders can purchase the solicitation package and access the system for a fee; see [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

Inquires regarding this solicitation should be directed to Jacob Lachapelle, jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 343-550-4560. Bidders should be advised that questions posed to anyone other than the point of contact during the solicitation period may result in the bidder being disqualified.
